Package org.waltonrobotics.controller

Class RamseteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waltonrobotics.controller.MotionController
      • org.waltonrobotics.controller.RamseteController
  • public class RamseteController
extends MotionController
    A RamseteController is very similar to our other MotionController, but it calculates the center and steer commands in a slightly more elegant method.
    Paper with some of the math (Theorem 8.5.2)
    The rest of the math was from Team 254's 2018 Nonlinear Feedback functions.
    Author:
    Russell Newton, Walton Robotics
